fields.name: Pokemon Ability:
fields.value:
Harvest: At the end of each night while you are alive, you will gain a berry, which can be given to any member of the Pokemon team. Each Pokemon may only carry one berry:
- Sitrus Berry: Provides an auto Basic Defense when attacked.
- Leppa Berry: Refills one use of an ability when it runs out.
- Persim Berry: Grants one-time redirect immunity.
- Pecha Berry: Grants one-time poison immunity/cure.
- Cheri Berry: Grants one-time roleblock immunity.
- Berries may be transferred to other members of the Pokemon at any time during the day or as a free action during the night.
